MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the FK2 postcode area of Falkirk. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are still working to repair grounded overhead line equipment at Thistlebank Cottage affecting the rest of our customers without power. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at1.58pm on Tuesday 10th November 2020.
